name: Road to the Moon
description:
Road to the Moon by Domenico-Labaki.

Submission for the GitHub Game Off 2020.

In this game you are a spacecraft with one destination: the moon. But reaching it won't be easy! Some enemies will try to stop you, defeat all waves of enemies to beat a level. Beat all 10 levels to win! 

Here is the link to the GitHub repository containing the source code and all needed data for the game: https://github.com/Domenico-Labaki/Road-to-the-Moon-game-source-code

Instructions on how to play:

How this game fits the theme:

The Game Off 2020 theme was MOONSHOT.

One of the definitions of this word is:

An act or instance of launching a spacecraft to the moon.

In this game, you are the spacecraft and you go through multiple levels to reach the moon!

Hope you enjoy!
